<a id="TextLine"></a>

# TextLine

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Holds a line of text.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstraction over [TextServer](TextServer.md) for handling a single line of text.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="TextLine_method_add_object"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **add_object**\ (\ key\: [Variant](Variant.md), size\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), inline_align\: [InlineAlignment](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_InlineAlignment) = 5, length\: [int](int.md) = 1, baseline\: [float](float.md) = 0.0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_add_object)

Adds inline object to the text buffer, `key` must be unique. In the text, object is represented as `length` object replacement characters.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_add_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **add_string**\ (\ text\: [String](String.md), font\: [Font](Font.md), font_size\: [int](int.md), language\: [String](String.md) = "", meta\: [Variant](Variant.md) = null\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_add_string)

Adds text span and font to draw it.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_clear)

Clears text line (removes text and inline objects).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_draw"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **draw**\ (\ canvas\: [RID](RID.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), color\: [Color](Color.md) = Color(1, 1, 1, 1), oversampling\: [float](float.md) = 0.0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_draw)

Draw text into a canvas item at a given position, with `color`. `pos` specifies the top left corner of the bounding box. If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_draw_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **draw_outline**\ (\ canvas\: [RID](RID.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), outline_size\: [int](int.md) = 1, color\: [Color](Color.md) = Color(1, 1, 1, 1), oversampling\: [float](float.md) = 0.0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_draw_outline)

Draw text into a canvas item at a given position, with `color`. `pos` specifies the top left corner of the bounding box. If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_inferred_direction"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Direction](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_Direction) **get_inferred_direction**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_inferred_direction)

Returns the text writing direction inferred by the BiDi algorithm.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_line_ascent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_line_ascent**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_line_ascent)

Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_line_descent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_line_descent**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_line_descent)

Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_line_underline_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_line_underline_position**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_line_underline_position)

Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_line_underline_thickness"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_line_underline_thickness**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_line_underline_thickness)

Returns thickness of the underline.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_line_width"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_line_width**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_line_width)

Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_object_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **get_object_rect**\ (\ key\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_object_rect)

Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_objects"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md) **get_objects**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_objects)

Returns array of inline objects.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_rid**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_rid)

Returns TextServer buffer RID.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_get_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_size**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_get_size)

Returns size of the bounding box of the text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_hit_test"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **hit_test**\ (\ coords\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_hit_test)

Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_resize_object"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **resize_object**\ (\ key\: [Variant](Variant.md), size\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), inline_align\: [InlineAlignment](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_InlineAlignment) = 5, baseline\: [float](float.md) = 0.0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_resize_object)

Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_set_bidi_override"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_bidi_override**\ (\ override\: [Array](Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_set_bidi_override)

Overrides BiDi for the structured text.

Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextLine_method_tab_align"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **tab_align**\ (\ tab_stops\: [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextLine_method_tab_align)

Aligns text to the given tab-stops.
